attributes.action: Create a graph showing how much take home pay increases as salary increases (marginal tax rate)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is difficult for the ordinary person to determine how much their take home pay will increase as they work extra hours, due to allowances, tax rates, tax credits and NI contributions. Two graphs should be available one in pounds, one showing percentage of additional income that is taken home/taken in tax.
